dict.acceptation: 暴力，强暴，暴虐；猛烈，激烈；歪曲（事实），曲解（意义）；冒渎，不敬；

sent.orig: We oppose violence directed against innocent civilians and disapprove the practice of using violence against violence.
sent.trans: 我们反对针对无辜平民的暴力活动，不赞成以暴易暴。

sent.orig: He said: "Palestinians must abandon violence. Resistance through violence and killing is wrong."
sent.trans: 他说“巴勒斯坦人必须放弃暴力。暴力抵抗和屠杀是错误的。”

sent.orig: Olny at this moment. we decided to bid defiance to the violence using violence.
sent.trans: 只有在这时候。我们才决定用暴力反抗暴力。

sent.orig: The act of violence among kinsfolks takes place in family's violence.
sent.trans: 家庭暴力是发生在家庭成员之间的暴力行为。

sent.orig: We have no alternative but to use revolutionary violence to suppress counter-revolutionary violence.
sent.trans: 我们只能用革命的暴力来镇压反革命的暴力。
